name: Gertrude's Cat
Start point: Gertrude in her house west of Varrock, south of the Cooking Guild.
Description: Gertrude's beloved cat, Fluffs, has gone missing and she is frantic with worry. She needs your help to track down Fluffs and bring her home safely.

substeps: Speak to Gertrude in her house west of Varrock (south of Cooks' Guild)
Agree to help find her missing cat Fluffs
Get directed to her sons in Varrock Square
Find Shilop and Wilough near Varrock Square fountain
Pay Shilop 100 coins for location info
Learn Fluffs is at Varrock Lumber Mill
Travel to Varrock Lumber Mill (north-east of Varrock)
Jump broken fence section on south side
Enter building and climb ladder to upper floor
Attempt to pick up Fluffs (causes 3 damage)
Use Bucket of milk on Fluffs
Combine Doogle leaf with Raw sardine to make Seasoned sardine
Feed Seasoned sardine to Fluffs
Climb back down ladder
Search crates until finding kitten (south-eastern crate recommended)
Collect kitten from crate
Return to Fluffs with kitten
Use kitten on Fluffs
Return to Gertrude's house
Speak to Gertrude to complete quest
